/** * DOMInput. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 2.2 2006-12-31 Use a DocumentBuilder instead of a Transformer for * better performance. *
2.1 2006-07-08 Support objects which don't have an ID. *
2.0 2006-06-10 Support for Enum and double array objects added. *
1.0 February 17, 2004 Created. */
